translations: n．舵手：在划船比赛中负责掌舵和指挥的人。
· The coxes were shouting instructions to their rowing teams.
舵手们正在向他们的划船队大声发号施令。

phrs.translation: n. 柯特妮·考克斯（美国女演员）

sentences.sentence: The coxes were wondering last night whether she would get into any great family.
sentences.translation: 昨晚，考克斯姐妹寻思着，她会不会去哪个上流人家。
